Plot: This book tells the story of “Kedar” a young man who through life’s sometimes cruel plays, ends up affecting and impacting on the world and happiness of “Panna Lal and his family. This book is set in 1930’s Punjab, before partition and was originally written in the Punjabi Language. Navdeep Suri has translated this Indian classic masterfully, preserving the sadness and poetry that flow through this exceptional work. The Author, Nanak Singh has been described as the father of the Punjabi Novel
